name: István Hatvani
content:
István Hatvani (1718–1786) was a Hungarian mathematician. He worked on developing some of the earliest elements of probability theory.
 This article about a Hungarian scientist is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about a European mathematician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
raw:
Hungarian mathematician
 István Hatvani.
István Hatvani (1718–1786) was a Hungarian mathematician. He worked on developing some of the earliest elements of probability theory.
